welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dix Hills! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, lively community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Dix Hills has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves domestic flights operated by JetBlue and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves domestic flights operated by Southwest and Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport provides all necessary amenities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private jets, there is a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport, where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
